entry.title: Jelly Belly Kids Mix - 100g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jelly Belly
Type: Candy District
Price: 3.49

Kids Mix Gourmet Jelly Beans

Enjoy Jelly Belly Kids’ Mix jelly beans in a 3.5-ounce bag. Each one contains 20 of the most popular jelly bean flavours that children love. This jelly bean assortment makes great candy for a party, gifts or giveaways. These jelly beans for kids are also perfect Jelly Belly Easter gifts and Jelly Belly Christmas gifts. Eliminate all of the beans in flavours that your kids don’t love and skip straight to their favourites with this mixed candy bag.

  • American Candy
  • Gluten-Free
  • Peanut Free
  • Dairy-Free
  • Fat-Free
  • Vegetarian-Friendly
  • Kosher

3.5 oz Bags | 12 COUNT BOX

entry.title: Jelly Belly Red Apple Jelly Beans-4.5 kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jelly Belly
Type: Candy District
Price: 99.00

Gourmet Jelly Beans Bulk Candy

There's nothing quite as lusciously delicious as a shiny red apple! Well, actually there is! You'll be swept off your feet with the Jelly Belly Red Apple Jelly beans! A bulk candy, that comes in a brilliant shade of red. 

These gourmet jelly beans would look fabulous on your next candy bar. Great to use at a birthday party, corporate event, as a wedding candy or Valentine's Day party. Perfect for any red-themed event!
Be the talk of the town with this red, retro candy! A favourite Jelly Bean since 1976!
Jelly Belly Red Apple jelly beans are romantic, red and ravishing and a must-try for every candy lover around!
  • 10 lbs of Red Apple flavour Jelly Belly jelly beans bulk candy packaged.
  • Approximately 400 beans per pound.
  • Sold by weight, not volume.
  • Colours shown are represented as accurate as possible but may vary depending on your video and/or monitor settings or other factors.
  • OU Kosher
  • Gluten-Free
  • Gelatin Free
  • Peanut Free
  • Dairy-Free
  • Fat-Free
  • Vegetarian
Your 10-lb.case is shipped in a sterile food-grade box to maintain the quality of the Jelly Belly jelly beans inside. The case does not use a plastic liner or bag as doing so, at this volume, may cause them to become sticky and clump together. If you’re not using all your delicious candy at once (we know it’s hard, but please remember moderation), we recommend storing Jelly Belly jelly beans in this food-grade box at room temperature away from sunlight to preserve quality all the way to the “Best By” date.

    SKU-52829

    10 lbs | 4.5 kg Box

    INGREDIENTS:

    SUGAR, CORN SYRUP, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH, APPLE JUICE FROM CONCENTRATE, CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF THE FOLLOWING: LACTIC ACID, CITRIC ACID, FUMARIC ACID, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, COLOR ADDED, RED 40, YELLOW 6, BEESWAX, CARNAUBA WAX, CONFECTIONER'S GLAZE.
